text: "You Make Me Feel So Young" is a 1946 popular song composed by Josef Myrow, with lyrics written by Mack Gordon. It was created for the movie Three Little Girls in Blue. The song was recorded by Frank Sinatra in 1956, and performed many times throughout his career. It is featured in the 2003 movie Elf. ==References== Category:1946 songs Category:Pop songs Category:Frank Sinatra songs Category:Michael Bubl√© songs
title: You Make Me Feel So Young
